ygData.subject: Re: on switching servers for a guild
ygData.msgSnippet: Let me know if this comes to fruition. As we on RZ advance in level and are able to travel more readily, having an alliance between the guild you propose in
ygData.messageBody:
Let me know if this comes to fruition.
As we on RZ advance in level and are able to travel more readily, having an
alliance between the guild you propose in the east, and Darkenbane, Blood
Coven, et.al. in the west, would be a force to be reckoned with, indeed.:)
Should my own guild idea come to be, I'd be more than interested.


----- Original Message -----
From: <pwolf@...>
To: <eq_shadowknights@onelist.com>
Sent: Friday, June 18, 1999 3:57 PM
Subject: Re: [eq_shadowknights] on switching servers for a guild


> From: <pwolf@...>
>
>
> Evil Guilds
>
> Darkenbane controls the ogres and trolls
> Numerous Dark Elven guilds are about
>
> all of these guilds, however, are near freeport, the eastern part of the
> continent, or sometimes they travel in the middle, such as the Karanas
> perhaps.
>
> But their is none on the western side of the continent, to strike true
fear
> upon the many druids, rangers, barbarians, and erudites among this area.
> The few that exist in this area, are but mere kinslayers (also referred to
> as newbie killers), the antics of the Knights Of Terror, and a few of the
> Covetous Crew that wander around...
>
> I was hoping, perhaps one day, that one such would come to strike true
> fear. But more or less I was thinking, of Humans and Erudites to do this.
> What I had in mind, a followers of the Plaguebringer. Necromancers,
Knights
> of the shadows, Enchanters, Dark Clerics, Murderous Warriors, Wizards and
> Mages, all whom follow the Plaguebringer, to form an alliance. Perhaps
this
> could be the player side of the Bloodsabers. I was also thinking of
letting
> the Erudite Necromancers to be a part of this as well, since they are far
> from evil civilization, and it is difficult for them to travel alone.
>
> Perhaps a great intro for this guild, would be to group up and go into BB,
> destroy everyone they encounter in the hills along the way, and massacre
> everything within BB.
>
> I know many of you would not be willing to give up your already developed
> characters on the splendid server of Zek, nor perhaps if you have one on
> another server, but this was just an idea I had in mind. Hoping one day it
> can come to be...
>
>
> The Redemptor
> Bloodsaber of Qeynos
>
> ------------------------------------------------------------------------
> ONElist: the best source for group communications.
> http://www.onelist.com
> Join a new list today!
